page.title: 19EDUCATION,FARNBOROUGH
page.content: The block is interesting in that it straddles two counties and includes both private and maintained schools. Surrey has one of its largest comprehensives and a middle school, whilst Hampshire has a number of infant,junior, and comprehensives,as well as a 6th form college each of which serves its local community. Within the area is also situated the Farnborough Hill Convent private school which caters for girls age 11 to 19 in competition with the local comp. schools.The Greencroft school completes the variety. It exists to help approx 70 children with learning difficulties. It draws upon an area 100 sq miles and pupils are transported to the school by bus, mini-bus, and taxi.
